original_text: He was with David at Pasdammim, and there the Philistines were gathered together to battle, where was a parcel of ground full of barley; and the people fled from before the Philistines.
korean_text: 그가 바스담밈에서 다윗과 함께 있었더니 블레셋 사람들이 그 곳에 모여와서 치니 거기에 보리가 많이 난 밭이 있더라 백성들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망하되

sentences.original_text: He was with David at Pasdammim
and there Philistines were gathered together to battle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그곳에서 블레셋 사람들이 전투를 위해 모여 있었다

sentences.original_text: where was a parcel of ground full of barley
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에는 보리로 가득한 땅 한 조각이 있었다

sentences.original_text: and people fled from before the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사람들이 블레셋 사람들 앞에서 도망쳤다
